Campaign Development.title: EU B&C Campaign Toolkit Guidance & Checklist
Campaign Development.description: A comprehensive toolkit checklist to be leveraged by project IATs in campaign development, to drive consistency and ensure all toolkits deployed include the necessary consolidated guidance for markets to execute campaign IBEs successfully.

Campaign Development.title: IBE Laydown Template
Campaign Development.description: IBE template tool to support IATs in consistent IBE planning, and for presentation of IBEs within final toolkits delivered.

Campaign Development.title: Equity Brief Ecosystem Template
Campaign Development.description: Guidance on how Equity or Purpose consumer journeys should best connect across an IBE as one campaign ecosystem for the consumer, as well as templates & tools for IAT planning

Campaign Development.title: Ecosystem Guidance & Templates [Master doc]
Campaign Development.description: Guidance developed by a team of IAT specialists on how IBE touchpoints should best connect as an ecosystem, as well as 10 golden rules to consider in campaign planning.
